text:
Canada Water is an London Underground and London Overground station located in Rotherhithe, in south-east London, England. It takes its name from Canada Water, a lake which was created from a former dock in the Port of London.
The station is located on the Jubilee line between and Canary Wharf stations and on the London Overground East London line between and stations. It provides an interchange point between the two lines. It is in Travelcard Zone 2.
